name: magenta
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a reddish-purple colour, one of the main colours that are used in colour printing and photography
atakan/DigitalVision Vectors/GettyImages

having a reddish-purple colour: This bold, handsome plant produces big clumps covered in magenta flowers. The drawing-room, with magenta curtains and large windows, was the setting for many social events.
More examplesFewer examplesI would pack that magenta top if I were you. She wore a fancy magenta dress for the occasion.This is a deep magenta-coloured, creamy soup, with crunchy chunks of summer vegetables.
